body.p:
To create a portable distribution of that you can keep on an USB stick:
Go to www.oxygenxml.com/InstData/Editor/Windows/VM/oxygen.zip and save the ZIP archive on your disk.The ZIP includes Java Virtual Machine.
Unpack the ZIP and copy the license.txt file to the unpacked directory.
Use oxygen /../oxygenAuthor// /../oxygenDeveloper// /../syncroSVNClient// .exe to start the application.
